main event: A witness in Mount Kisco, New York observed a bright, glowing object in the sky that hovered, then moved rapidly away in October 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared as a bright, white or blue-white, perfectly round object about the size of a golf ball held at arm's length.
The object hovered for about 5 minutes before rapidly moving away to the west.
The witness described the object as being under intelligent control and likely of extraterrestrial origin.
The object made no sound and did not leave any trails or vapor.
The witness had seen unusual lights in the sky before, but this was the most impressive and closest sighting they had experienced.
